Big Footprint.AGGRESSIVE: THIS IS YOUR FOOTPRINT ISN'T IT?... TELL ME NOW
Big Footprint.NICE: Hey I like your shoes, are they the same as this footprint?

Small Footprint.AGGRESSIVE: THIS IS YOUR FOOTPRINT ISN'T IT?... TELL ME NOW
Small Footprint.NICE: Hey I like your shoes, are they the same as this footprint?

Glasses.AGGRESSIVE: DO YOU NEED TO WEAR GLASSES?...  TELL ME NOW, OR ELSE!
Glasses.NICE: Hey, I think you'd look great in these glasses I've found, have you ever seen them before?

Bag.AGGRESSIVE: DO YOU OWN A BAG!?... TELL ME NOW!
Bag.NICE: You seem like someone with a keen eye for fashion, what do you think about this bag?

Lipstick.AGGRESSIVE: IS THAT LIPSTICK YOU ARE WEARING?
Lipstick.NICE: Your lips look great, do you wear lipstick?

Right Handed.AGGRESSIVE: ARE YOU OR ARE YOU NOT RIGHT HANDED!?... TELL ME NOW AND YOU BETTER NOT LIE!
Right Handed.NICE: Your right arm is big and strong, I'm sure you must be right handed to get it to that stage?

Dark Hair.AGGRESSIVE: DO YOU HAVE DARK HAIR!?... YOU BETTER NOT ANSWER SARCASTICALLY!
Dark Hair.NICE: I can't tell if that hair is part of your costume, can you tell me what colour your actual hair is?

Erotic Novel.AGGRESSIVE: DO YOU ENJOY TERRIBLE BOOKS LIKE THIS ONE?!... WELL?!
Erotic Novel.NICE: I just found a copy of my favourite book! Do you know who it belongs to?

Broken Mobile Phone.AGGRESSIVE: I DEMAND TO KNOW IF THIS IS YOUR PHONE IMMEDIATELY!!!
Broken Mobile Phone.NICE: I just found someone's broken phone. Do you recognise it? I'd love to return it.

Car Keys.AGGRESSIVE: ARE THESE YOUR CAR KEYS?! TELL ME NOW OR I'LL MURDER YOUR FIRST-BORN!!
Car Keys.NICE: Hey you look like you have good taste in cars. What make is yours?

Hardware Magazine.AGGRESSIVE: DO YOU RECOGNISE THIS MAGAZINE? TELL ME!
Hardware Magazine.NICE: You look pretty handy, do you know who's this is?

Diamond Ring.NICE: Someone dropped this expensive looking ring; do you know who's it is?

Receipt.AGGRESSIVE: THIS IS YOUR RECEIPT, ISN'T IT?
Receipt.NEUTRAL: Do you know who's receipt this is?
Receipt.NICE: I found this receipt lying around, any idea who's it could be?

USB Stick.NEUTRAL: Have you ever seen this memory stick?
USB Stick.NICE: You seem like you know a USB stick from a floppy disk. Do you know who dropped this one?

Energy Drink.AGGRESSIVE: DID YOU DRINK THIS DISGUSTINGLY UNHEALTHY CAN OF EXTREME-HYPER-ENERGY??
Energy Drink.NEUTRAL: I found this hidden away in an odd place. Have you seen anyone drinking it?
Energy Drink.NICE: I'm sure you know better than to drink something so vile, but have you seen anyone else doing so?

Sweet Wrapper.AGGRESSIVE: YOU DROPPED THIS WRAPPER, DIDN'T YOU?! LITTER BUG!
Sweet Wrapper.NEUTRAL: Have you seen anyone eating these sweets?
Sweet Wrapper.NICE: I was tidying the area and found some of these on the floor. Do you know who dropped them?
